title: The Mirror's Gift

panel_structure.description: Wide shot of void workshop with mirror-tools reflecting not appearance but essence, Evan and Architect seeing themselves through each other's perception
Close on their faces as they realize they're beautiful in ways they never imagined possible

transformation_notes: The void workshop's mirrors become tools of loving perception. They see themselves not as they fear they are, but as they're truly seen by someone who loves them.
dialogue_rhythm: Soft revelations, wonder at being truly seen
